colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022A *, ,(CES PHUG LUGS KYI RTZIS KYIS LEGS BSHAD MKHAS PA'I @022B MGUL RGYAN DO SHAL DPYOD LDAN SNYING NOR LAS, GSHIN RTZIS CUNG ZAD SPROD 'DI NI NYAM PHRA ZHING LHUN PO DON GRUB DBANG RGYAL GYI NAG PAR RTZIS DBYINGS SNYIGS MA'I DUS SU 'GRAN PA'I ZLA BRAL LTA BU YIG CHA DANG GONG MA RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I, GSHIN RTZIS KYI YIG CHA MANG PO NANG NAS KHYUNG NAG SH'AKYA KA RA'I MDZAD PA'I GSHIN RTZIS 'DI NI HA CANG DGONGS PA YIN 'DUG KYANG, GZHAN YANG PHAN CHEN SMON 'GRO BA'I DPE CHA RGYUN DUS 'CHI MED BDE BA'I GSHIN RTZIS BSKOR DANG BSTUN LA RANG NYID KYI RIG PAS DBYAD DE, THANG TSIG BCOS THABS SOGS CUNG ZAD GSAL BAR BYAS LA, SPYI BA'I DON BCU GSUM PA SOGS BSDUS SHIN DON TSANG PAS 'TSOL DANG, DUR BTAB LAS GZHAN NI TSOGS PAR BGYIS PA'I KYANG 'GRO BA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI 'CHI BA MED PA'I TSE YI RIG 'DZIN THOB PA DANG, @023A *, ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS GNAS SKABS SU THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS PA DANG DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR SHOG ,DGE'O,, LEGS SO,, ,,)
